text: The entire courtyard shall be a hundred cubits long and fifty cubits wide,27:18 The courtyard was approximately 150 feet long and 75 feet wide (45.7 meters long and 22.9 meters wide). with curtains of finely spun linen five cubits high,27:18 5 cubits is approximately 7.5 feet or 2.3 meters. and with bronze bases.
